title: SAHAAY: Trust-first citizen guidance web app (multilingual, chat-first, safety-focused)

requirements.text: Create the SAHAAY MVP shell with a chat-first interface for citizen guidance (web). The UI must clearly communicate that SAHAAY provides explanations and process clarity, not professional advice or decisions.

quotes: SAHAAY is a multilingual, chat-first AI platform… It provides guidance, explanations, and process clarity, NOT decisions.
This is NOT a chatbot clone. This is a citizen guidance system.
Your priorities: Legal safety, Accuracy & trust, Scale across India, Simplicity for non-technical users

acceptanceCriteria: App loads to a primary chat-style screen with message history and an input area.

A persistent, visible disclaimer states: informational guidance only; not legal/professional advice; not a substitute for official sources; emergency disclaimer for urgent situations (e.g., police/112).
The UI includes an easy way to start a new session / clear conversation.

requirements.text: Implement multilingual support with a language selector and a language-preference state used across the UI and guidance responses. Include at least: English and Hindi (with a UI that can be extended to more Indian languages later).

quotes: SAHAAY is a multilingual, chat-first AI platform

acceptanceCriteria: User can switch language from a selector in the header/settings.
Selected language persists across page refresh (e.g., local storage on frontend and/or backend profile).
Guidance responses reflect the selected language for the supported languages (minimum English + Hindi).
All user-facing text in the build request is implemented in English by default; non-English content is limited to language-specific responses/translations.

requirements.text: Add curated knowledge modules in the backend for: (1) Laws & Rights explanations, (2) Government processes/schemes/process steps, and (3) Life-situation guided flows (e.g., job loss, salary issues, fraud). These modules should drive responses without relying on external AI/LLM services.

quotes: SAHAAY helps Indian citizens understand: Laws, Rights, Government processes, Life situations (job loss, salary issues, fraud, etc.)

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query/update methods to: list modules/topics, fetch a topic by id, and generate a guidance response from curated content + selected language.

At least 3 life-situation flows exist as structured step-by-step guidance (job loss, salary issue, fraud) with: what it means, typical steps, documents/info to gather, and when to contact official channels.
Content is clearly informational and avoids individualized legal conclusions or telling users what to do as definitive advice.

requirements.text: Implement trust & safety features: (a) strong disclaimers, (b) source citations for each guidance response when applicable, and (c) ‘What SAHAAY can/can’t do’ panel in the UI.

quotes: Your priorities: Legal safety, Accuracy & trust
SAHAAY explains complex systems in simple human language, without giving professional advice.

acceptanceCriteria: Each guidance response can optionally include a ‘Sources’ section populated from backend-provided citations (title + URL + optional note).
UI includes a dedicated panel or modal: ‘What SAHAAY can do’ and ‘What SAHAAY cannot do’, emphasizing non-advice positioning.
A safety note is shown for sensitive situations (e.g., fraud/harassment): direct users to official channels; no vigilantism; no sharing sensitive personal data.

requirements.text: Add a guided entry experience for non-technical users: provide quick-start tiles/buttons for common situations (e.g., Job loss, Salary issue, Fraud) and common intents (Understand a law/right, Understand a government process).

quotes: Life situations (job loss, salary issues, fraud, etc.)

acceptanceCriteria: Chat screen shows a set of quick-start options before the first message in a new session.
Selecting a tile starts the appropriate guided flow and populates the first assistant message with the flow introduction.
Users can return to quick-start options via a ‘Start over’ action.

requirements.text: Create a simple conversation/session model: users can have multiple saved sessions locally and/or in the backend; each session stores messages, selected language, and chosen flow/topic context.
acceptanceCriteria: User can create a new session and view a list of recent sessions (basic sidebar or menu).
Selecting a session restores its message history and context.
Messages persist across refresh for the current user identity (anonymous local persistence is acceptable; Internet Identity integration can be used if available in the template).

requirements.text: Add an admin-free content bootstrap: ship the MVP with a small built-in curated dataset (topics, flows, and citations) compiled into the backend so the app works end-to-end without external dependencies.

quotes: SAHAAY explains complex systems in simple human language

acceptanceCriteria: On first deploy, the app has a non-empty set of topics and flows available immediately.
Each included topic has plain-language explanation text and (when relevant) citations links.
No external database or external API is required for the MVP content.

requirements.text: Define and apply one coherent visual theme for SAHAAY (India-first, trust-first, accessible). Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette. Use high-contrast typography, clear hierarchy, and mobile-first layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The app uses a consistent color palette (not primarily blue/purple), typographic scale, spacing, and component styling across screens.
Chat UI is readable and accessible on mobile widths.
Theme is applied consistently to header, chat bubbles, buttons, and panels.

requirements.text: Generate and include basic static brand assets for SAHAAY (logo mark + wordmark + subtle background pattern) and render them from the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Project: SAHAAY — India’s National AI Guide

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Header includes the SAHAAY logo/wordmark.
Landing/chat background uses a subtle pattern that does not reduce readability.

required: SAHAAY logo mark, minimal, trustworthy, India-inspired geometric icon (sahaay-logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
SAHAAY wordmark, clean sans-serif logotype, black/dark variant on transparent background (sahaay-wordmark.dim_1400x400.png)
Subtle background pattern, low-contrast, abstract India-inspired motif (sahaay-bg-pattern.dim_2000x2000.png)

goalsToAdd: Build SAHAAY: a trust-first, legally safe, multilingual, chat-first citizen guidance platform for India focused on laws/rights, government processes, and common life situations.
preferencesToAdd: Prefer simple, accessible UX for non-technical users with strong safety disclaimers and source citations.
miscToAdd: Product posture: informational guidance only; not legal/professional advice; no decisions.
